description: This file defines a React functional component 'LoginPage' for a login interface, utilizing hooks for state management, authentication context, and navigation. It renders a login form with email and password fields, and handles login logic via an external authentication hook.

methods.name: LoginPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form, managing authentication and form state, handling form submission, and redirecting upon successful login.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls the login function, and sets error message on failure.
